name: Pencil's Dream
description:
Pencil's Dream is a game where you play as a pencil to complete certain objective, but Bubble King keep disturbing you by sending his minions and installing weapons everywhere. Your main weapon is the "Pencil's Carbon", "Pencil's Carbon" act like an ammo and fuel at once.

The Control:

Change Direction by Moving Around Your Cursor

Hold Q To Draw

Press W To Change Colour of The Carbon

More Information in Information Section!
